name: Yulia Kanapatskaya
short_description: ~15 years in web development with deep JavaScript expertise and a frontend focus.
about: Skilled in React, Node.js, NestJS, and Next.js. Experienced in building systems from scratch and maintaining legacy codebases across monoliths, SPAs, microservices, and monorepos. Proficient with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD. Strong track record in shaping technical direction, setting roadmaps, and leading cross-functional collaboration. Master's in Computer Systems Engineering.
